channel.title: Did you know?
channel.description:
You can't say Zybez in game, with the profanity filter off.
Anyone know why?

item.title: Did you know?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

Rix_:

http://forums.zybez.net/topic/1530374-why-doesnt-jagex-support-zybez/page__view__findpost__p__14370133

item.title: Did you know?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:13, topic:426081”][quote author=Nathan R link=topic=528769.msg3857218#msg3857218 date=1324426309]

There was some deal about Jagex wanting to advertise on their website or something like that, and they said no. Jagex has filtered them ever since.

I don’t see why that would be a problem…

Well Jagex obviously didn’t like the idea
[/quote]The entire website is devoted to Runescape… :|[/quote]
So is ours, just ours is about reverse-engineering Runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: Did you know?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Nathan R, post:10, topic:426081”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=528769.msg3857197#msg3857197 date=1324424970]

There was some deal about Jagex wanting to advertise on their website or something like that, and they said no. Jagex has filtered them ever since.

I don’t see why that would be a problem…
[/quote]
Well Jagex obviously didn’t like the idea[/quote]

I’m talking about Zybez, who cares if RuneScape advertises on their site. It’s based on that game anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Did you know?
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:1, topic:426081”]You can’t say Zybez in game, with the profanity filter off.

Anyone know why?[/quote]
But you can say moparscape, lol. Zybez is one of the earliest fansites out there and it’s not even listed as a trusted fansite by Jagex… whereas all that bullshit with RSBuddy…

I don’t think they’ve even been associated with cheating, so really baffled as to why Zybez is censored. RuneScape Community was one of the best places to be (haven’t been there in over 6 years).

Read full topic

item.title: Did you know?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Zybez has RS Gold farm advertisements on their site, Jagex asked them to take them off and Zybez said no. So Jagex did the mature thing by taking their name off the RS community.

Read full topic
